title: Mrs Ryan's drama class
creator_credit: Michael Rubbo, Tom Daly, Cecily Burwash and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: An experiment in free-wheeling dramatic expression for a class of 8-12 year olds. Under the direction of their teacher, Mrs. Ryan, they invent their own dramas progressing in skill and confidence to the point where they stage their own play for the rest of the school.
creator_credit_for_label: Michael Rubbo, Tom Daly, Cecily Burwash and National Film Board of Canada
